In order to provide our services, CardioMood may need to process your private data behind the scenes.\nYour private data will never be shown or disclosed to any third party without your permission or explicit request. Stop measurement Start measurement Stop Start Spectral power graph shows the ratio between activities of sympathetic (VLF and LF) and parasympathetic (HF) nervous systems. Histogram shows the distribution of R-R intervals by various interval ranges. Wider histogram corresponds to a higher HRV. Scattergram is a graphical representation of R-R intervals distribution (current is on X and previous is on Y).\nPoints at scattergram can be visually combined into an ellipse.
